EmailTemplate.name: MPW-RecallFormReservation
EmailTemplate.subject: MPW reservation form {!MPW_Reservation__c.Name} for {!MPW_Reservation__c.MPW_Train_Name__c} has been recalled by Owner.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
MPW reservation form {!MPW_Reservation__c.Name} for {!MPW_Reservation__c.MPW_Train_Name__c} has been recalled by Owner.
Please update the form and resubmit.
If you are cancelling your participation in {!MPW_Reservation__c.MPW_Train_Name__c}, please void the form
